title: Watashi ni Tenshi ga Maiorita! (WATATEN!: an Angel Flew Down to Me)
synopsis: College student Miyako Hoshino is quite shy around other people. She mostly spends her time in her room making cosplay outfits. When her fifth-grade sister Hinata brings her classmate Hana Shirosaki home, Miyako instantly becomes captivated with Hana's cuteness.
